inputs.prompt:
[global caption] The scene features a racecar driver, [character1], wearing a fireproof racing suit streaked with rubber dust and oil, helmet tucked under one arm. His eyes are sharp and alert, jaw set with quiet confidence. The setting is a roaring professional racetrack—grandstands vibrating, pit crews in motion, heat shimmering over the asphalt. This scene contains 6 shots.
[per shot caption] Medium shot of [character1] standing beside his racecar in the pit lane, gloved hands resting on the cockpit as engineers move around him.
[shot cut] Close-up of his hands tightening the chin strap of his helmet, the fabric pulling taut with deliberate precision.
[shot cut] Extreme close-up of his eyes behind the visor as it lowers, reflecting flashing lights and blurred motion from the track.
[shot cut] Low-angle shot of the racecar’s tires as they spin briefly, rubber gripping the asphalt and kicking up smoke.
[shot cut] Medium close-up inside the cockpit as [character1] grips the steering wheel, breath steady, dashboard lights flickering to life.
[shot cut] Wide tracking shot of the car launching out of the pit lane and accelerating onto the track, blending into the flow of high-speed machines.
inputs.negative_prompt: lowres, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, ugly, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, out of frame, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck, username, watermark, signature
